title: Sleek Designs and Innovation Await in New York Auto Show

seo_title: Sleek Designs and Innovation Await in New York Auto Show
long_description:
The most awaited event of the automotive industry is here: New York International Auto Show returns to New York City from March 30 to April 8, 2018. Think of it as an event reminiscent of the good ol' World's Fair of the 19th Century. Why that particular period? Because it was a time of unimaginable technological advances and innovation. Well, this year's Auto Show is slated to be more astounding than ever.

 

The Auto Show is famous for displaying the largest collection of cars, SUVs and trucks in the world. However, there's so much more to see and do than gaping at exquisite and streamlined vehicles. Each year, companies unveil their latest models and technology - the very best of the automotive  universe converges right here. And you’ll be the first to see it.

 

However, this exhibition houses more than just the sexiest and fastest vehicles known to humankind. Interactive presentations take spectators for a spin while virtual reality experiences will keep all members of the family entertained. Speaking of families, this Auto Show is absolutely family-friendly. Games, challenges, photo opportunities and play areas cater to the youngest in your family.

 

What's more, each day new events take place, from guided tours to performance shows. Consult the Auto Show's calendar for more information. Keep in mind that the Auto Show has taken over four floors of Javits Center—there's so much to see, do and photograph that you'll probably have to set the best part of a day to explore it.

More Information

Location
Jacob Javits Convention Center
11th Ave. between 34th & 40th St.

Hours
Monday – Saturday: 10 am - 10 pm.
Sundays: 10 am - 7 pm.

Tickets
Adult General Admission $17.
Child (under 12) General Admission $7.
Consider acquiring a Pre-Show Private Group Tour on select days to see the show without the crowds.
Purchase tickets online or at Javits Center.

Royalton New York Hotel is located just a short drive from Javits Center. Check our special offers and book your room today to stay in the best rooms in the heart of New York City.
